html:
10.25.21  10:41 pm   bill help, i did a bad thing. what should i do?

      do a medium thing. it will seem great compared to the other thing

10.25.21  10:36 pm   Whenever I release a song I usually end up with an empty feeling in my stomach because there were probably ways I could have made it better. Is this inevitable,

     maybe

     or can an artist feel fulfilled after releasing a song?

      yes

10.25.21  10:13 pm   how do i make the music that i can hear in my head into music that you can hear in your head?

      you'll have to compromise. but as you start making any sounds you can, you'll start to gradually see the [music you can make] and the [music you imagine] start to merge

10.25.21  9:50 pm   If you had to be buried with ONE brand of root beer which one would it be

      i don't know any of the brands

10.25.21  9:40 pm   how long of a break do you  give yourself between finishing one song and starting the next

      1 day maximum. or more, if you consider the period of "general writing" which is when i come up with brand new ideas, and also develop existing ideas, before making a final selection of which one is produced next. i like to allow 2 to 3 days of general writing before making a selection

10.25.21  9:27 pm   how much time does it take for a minute?

      about 60 seconds

10.25.21  8:40 pm   What music key is the world in
I want to say D major but it doesn't seem right

      every key

10.25.21  7:42 pm   At which point in the songwriting process do you come up with the title?

      that would vary from song to song. sometimes it is known first, before even any melody. other times i may arrive on the obvious title by the time i reach the chorus. other times, i may change the title after the song is finished

10.25.21  7:40 pm   what's your favorite thing to get wrong

      wrongness itself

10.25.21  7:05 pm   Congratulations on the new video bill, did you get the idea for the song a while ago like "I'm a Princess" or did you write it recently, like in the last few months?

      i wrote it in late april 2021, immediately before recording it. "i'm a princess" was also written immediately before recording it, in april 2019

10.25.21  7:00 pm   what should I put in my root beer

      i'm not even sure what's already in it

10.25.21  6:09 pm   how do you feel about youtube tutorials that take a get few minutes before anything is actually taught

      weak. this is a sign of weakness, i feel

10.25.21  6:03 pm   on a 1-10 scale how would you rate the changing of the seasons?

      10

10.25.21  5:35 pm   how to find a better way to talk to someone?

      start by deciding how you have been talking to them

10.25.21  4:42 pm   how do i use a computer

      don't worry, the computer will use you

10.25.21  3:48 pm   where is the metaphysical place where music ends and you begin?

      i think they overlap

10.25.21  3:00 pm   how do you get a better handwriting?

      just write everything

10.25.21  2:50 pm   how does each of your songs vary so much, but one could recognize your music from just 3 seconds of just about any of your songs?

      that's easy. i just make sure they're really loud

10.25.21  2:49 pm   why do people call the world reality, like how does anyone know what reality is? isn't it relative 

      it's probably just a suggestive guideline

10.25.21  2:21 pm   Sometimes i feel like a pawn in my own life

      maybe you can go for an en-passant sometime

10.25.21  2:16 pm   hey bill, got any advice on how to be normal?

      you have to make a reservation like 50 years in advance

10.25.21  1:41 pm   How fast can you write a song in 3 seconds?

      in 3 seconds

10.25.21  1:27 pm   what's a cool way to make more grass?

      i'm not sure. i don't know anything about grass

10.25.21  1:24 pm   Hey, when did you write you new song?

      i'm writing one now

10.25.21  1:02 pm   Everything that comes out of your mind is poetry. How did you get this way?

      instead of putting myself on the spot, i one day decided that the whole world must be the spot. so then i was free to roam

10.25.21  12:57 pm   what motivates you to create

      pretty much everything

10.25.21  12:00 pm   do you want to be friends? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.25.21  11:33 am   what should one do if they're seen as awkward? I'm often told that I come off as a rude and arrogant person even when I don't intend to because I'm blunt and also slightly clueless about social norms. I'm sick of people's expectations but people in general are not willing to help you unless you're conforming? it's so hard to find a balance between being yourself and being what others expect you to be. I used to seek a lot of validation from others before, but now I'm slightly more self-confident. However, a few people have asked me if I'm depressed or something and try to figure out what's "wrong" with me (and they try to be subtle about it), and I just get the general feeling that people don't like being in my presence because I'm too uncomfortable or stand-offish. Although I've learned not to mind it too much, I feel this is only going to alienate me further from others and prevent me from getting things done. idk I'm just venting here, sorry

      i'd say take all the energy you just spent regarding what other people think of you, and put it toward being who you actually think you should be. after a few years of some genuine devotion, you'll probably turn out to be a superstar

10.25.21  11:32 am   how much time does writing and recording a song take in your current ideal schedule? (maybe ideal not good word, because that is prob like a day. how bout "realistic" or "reasonable")

      i currently have the opinion that writing should be allowed to take several days, if necessary. the production time however, should be significantly condensed from what it sometimes has been, especially last time. 3 days seems great for song production, and i'm sure it's possible. 1 day would be better, and i'm sure that's possible too

10.25.21  10:38 am   i noticed that most videos are in helvetica but the recent ones are in arial. why?

      i prefer an extremely normal looking font. i actually can't tell the difference between those 2 fonts. perhaps helvetica wasn't available

10.25.21  9:50 am   What is the difference between "dumb" and "stupid"?

      dumb is dumber than stupid

10.25.21  8:43 am   do you have any ways to deal with feeling creatively spent?

      learn about what everyone else has created

10.25.21  7:52 am   What genre of music would you say you make

      regular

10.25.21  5:25 am   i'm gonna be in medschool for the next five years. how do i focus on art?

     this might be good or bad news, but, there are an unlimited number of ways to focus on art. art is totally unlimited

      is this going to be a period of really really slow improvement?

     i don't know

     because that puts a bit of a damper on my plans lol

10.25.21  2:37 am   what inspires you?

      whenever i walk inside or outside, or through doors in general

10.25.21  1:31 am   I remember some old questions where you recommend using whatever tools are most easily available to get started making music or videos or whatever. since you've put a lot of effort into switching to new software, do you think the old tools were holding you back

     yes. i was wrong about this in some ways, and right about it in other ways

     and is your advice still the same?

      yes

10.25.21  1:10 am   how does hearing gated reverb make you feel

      fine

10.25.21  12:05 am   How do I write a poem?

      write anything

10.24.21  11:42 pm   do you think of melodies first or chords?

      both at the same time, but the melody is leading the way. actually, it's usually best when the lyrical content leads the way but the melody and chords also show up at the exact same time

10.24.21  11:25 pm   Whats the new song about

      fear

10.24.21  10:10 pm   when is the universe gonna end

      some other time

10.24.21  9:34 pm   How do you get your inspirations for your animations?

      if it's a song, i get the inspiration from the song. if it's not a song, then the animation is inspired from the script i've written

10.24.21  9:13 pm   Who is the little dude who's been in your videos lately? Is it you? Is it Steve? Is it the "Randy" I keep hearing about up in the corner of the uqestions page? Guidance is formally requested

      it's my current best graphical representation of a person. looking forward to giving it some variances and expanding my capabilities to be able to include multiple persons in a video at the same time

10.24.21  8:52 pm   do you see your viewers as individuals or as a whole, a crowd of sorts?

      individuals

10.24.21  8:40 pm   have you ever thought of exploring other genres of music?

      why not just combine them all, and explore them that way

10.24.21  8:21 pm   do you say "aesthetic" like ESS-THETIC or AY-ESTHETIC

      ass thetic

10.24.21  8:07 pm   I'm having a rough time in my sound design class. The class is super free-form and relaxed, but he says by the end we should be able to make sounds sound exactly like they sound in our heads. It's throwin me for a loop. That's not how I really work with sound, cause I know that the sound I hear in my head is impossible to replicate 1 to 1. So what do?

      it sounds like your teacher has slightly exaggerated things, or possibly has lower standards than you do

10.24.21  7:55 pm   Do you ever get annoyed by certain questions that are ask over and over again?

      no

10.24.21  5:14 pm   if you were a number you'd be 5.05 but what number do YOU think you are?

      i'd be able to change. that's because i'm *alive*

10.24.21  4:48 pm   hotel?

      that makes sense
